sourcesContent:
Select your clocks:

import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; import { ClockData } from '../models/clockData.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-check-box', templateUrl: './check-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./check-box.component.scss'] }) export class CheckBoxComponent { cities = this._formBuilder.group({ Jerusalem: true, London: true, Manhattan: true, Tokyo: true }); @Input() clocks: ClockData []; constructor(private _formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} toggleClock(clock: ClockData) { clock.checked = !clock?.checked; } }
